it.polimi.ingsw.bogliobresich.model.cards

Class ItemCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.bogliobresich.model.cards.ItemCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Card, CardPlayableInPhase, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdrenalineItemCard, AttackItemCard, DefenceItemCard, SedativesItemCard, SpotlightItemCard, TeleportItemCard

    public abstract class ItemCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements Card, CardPlayableInPhase, java.io.Serializable
    This class provides a skeletal implementation of an item card. The ItemCard class represents the only type of card that could be played by a player during the match. The play method allow to change the match state with the effect of the item card card.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    matteo bresich, simone boglio
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
